body_html: @ngimel Can you provide more details on how to omit the hidden state? If I just pass one argument I get "TypeError: forward() missing 1 required positional argument: 'hx'". If I use None or 0 for hx I get "'NoneType' object has no attribute 'dim'". Thanks!
